ygData.subject: Re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: i was bored tonight and decided to check out this mesterious lamp, i cliked it and was lookin around, and decided to ask guide 1. i asked her where does this
ygData.messageBody:
i was bored tonight and decided to check out this mesterious lamp, i cliked
it and was lookin around, and decided to ask guide 1. i asked her "where
does this light lead" and she said to go check in with the receptionist, i
asked him the same and he mentioned king akannon. well i went to our good
king and asked the same question but go the same response from him as i got
from everyone else, the schpeal about the founding of teh city. well it
sounded like the creek from the lamp came from this area, but i couldnt find
anything. alos im only indiferent to the king so, mabey faction affects it.
well this is just my bit of help. hopefully this lil bit of info will lead
somewhere.
ttfn
Jubee Kibagami a Forsaken Soul of the Tunare Server


>From: Yigman008@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] an Idea
>Date: Thu, 6 Jan 2000 22:26:36 EST
>
>I was readin a post, I discounted it as major B.S. but checked it out
>regardless since I was in Ak'anon. It mentioned somethin bout a clockwork
>dragon, now the dragon, I don't believe, not by a longhshot. But it also
>mentioned one of those lamp, star light post things, and when ya click it,
>it
>makes a door opening sound and turns 90 degrees. I thought that it was
>worth
>2 seconds investigation, so I found the one that wasn't soinning next to
>the
>lake. I clicked it, and sure enough, it turned bout 90 degrees, and I heard
>the door creak. I have no idea what this is about, knowing my luck, this
>little topic has popped up on the list before, but I'm a recent addition to
>it. If it has, GOOD! someone please fill me in and quench my curiosity. If
>it
>hasn't, anyone have any ideas what it is, cause who knows, what if it has
>valid importance, this is a long shot, but it may have somethin to with
>diamond dust. I know I know, there's a bunch of you thinking I'm prime full
>of it, but about the little door creak and star lamp thing, I'm not, I
>invite
>you to see it yourself. Anyways, I jus thought I'd toss that one out there.
>If it's been brought up before, forgive me for my insolence.
>
>Yigoron,
>30 Magician,
>Bristlebane
